roleset.name: payment outstanding

example.name: ditransitive
example.text: They have since mellowed, although one senior Young& Rubicam executive said ``I think ad agencies owe Carl Spielvogel a vote of thanks for getting him out of the consulting business.''
example.arg: a vote of thanks for getting him out of the consulting business.''

example.name: prepositional arg2
example.text: Columbia owes its spectacular growth in recent years to its junk-bond portfolio, the largest of any U.S. thrift.
example.arg: its spectacular growth in recent years
to its junk-bond portfolio, the largest of any U.S. thrift.

example.name: passivized price
example.text: The buy-out group has begun billing UAL for fees and expenses *trace* it owes *trace* to investment bankers, law firms and banks.
example.arg: to investment bankers, law firms and banks.

example.name: passivized 'seller'
example.text: Under the plan, unsecured creditors, who *trace* are owed *trace* about $430 million, would receive about $92 million , or 21 cents for each dollar they are owed.

example.name: double passive
example.text: Under the plan, unsecured creditors, who are owed about $430 million, would receive about $92 million, or 21 cents for each dollar *trace-1* they are owed *trace* *trace-3*.

roleset.note: OWE-V NOTES: Note that price and commodity have been reversed from 'pay' (from owe.01-v)
